title: Horrifying moment a 58-year-old nurse stabs and hangs her neighbor's pooch Apollo
text:
A 58-year-old nurse was arrested on Thursday in northeastern Argentina after a video captured the horrific moment she stabbed and hanged her neighbor's pooch, killing him.

The suspect, whose name was not released by authorities, carried out the killing after she found the canine fighting with her pet dog outside her home on Monday.

Argentine outlet Nuevo Diario reported that the suspect separated both dogs and then dragged her neighbor's pet, Apollo, and used a cable to hang it to a tree in their backyard in Cayastá, a municipality in the province of Santa Fe.

A 10-year-old boy next door recorded the horrible scene as the woman repeatedly stabbed it in front of two sisters, ages four and six.

WARNING GRAPHIC CONTENT

A 58-year-old woman (left) was arrested Thursday after she killed her neighbor's dog (right), who she caught fighting her own pet pooch and hanged it from a tree

A four-year-old girl (left) tries to save her pet dog Apollo (right) moments before her neighbor, a 58-year-old nurse (center), kills him

The nurse (left) used a cable to tie the dog (right) to a tree in her neighbor's backyard before she savagely attacked him in front of the owner's daughter and her older sister

The four-year-old girl tried to save Apollo by distracting the woman and hitting her with an object that appeared to be a rope.

Her older sister subsequently comes into the scene in another video as the woman continues to plunge the knife into the Apollo before the frightened sisters disappeared out of the camera's view.

Apollo's owner, who was identified as Jonathan, appeared before the local police department in Cayastá to file a report but because of lack of actions from the cops, he took to his Facebook account to express his anger.

Jonathan told Argentine outlet Cronica that Apollo would wander out of his home whenever he was at work and head to his ex-wife's residence, where his daughter lives with her mother, sister and step-father.

He said he rescued Apollo and two other puppies, who he gave up for adoption, from a garbage dump two years ago.

'We never imagined this ending and we need this lady to be behind bars,' Jonathan said.

'She's not right in the head. She cannot subject an animal to such cruelty in front of minors and get out of this with impunity. She was even recorded while doing it, I don't know what other proof it takes for someone to help us .'

Police finally intervened Thursday and arrested the woman.

If found guilty, she could spend between 15 days to a year in jail.
description: WARNING GRAPHIC CONTENT: A 58-year-old nurse was arrested in Argentina Thursday, three days after she savagely beat her neighbor's dog to death in front of two children.
